document.docAuthor: Yamaguchi, Carolina & Lamas, Carlos José Einicker
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the types of Asiloidea (Diptera) in the collection of the Museu de Zoologia da Universidade de São Paulo, Brazil (Part 1: Bombyliidae and Mydidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the types of Asiloidea (Diptera) in the collection of the Museu de Zoologia da Universidade de São Paulo, Brazil (Part 1: Bombyliidae and Mydidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Cunha, A. M. & Lamas, C. J. E.
bibRefCitation.refString: Cunha, A. M. & Lamas, C. J. E. (2005) Two new species of Heterostylum Macquart (Diptera, Bombyliidae, Bombyliinae) from Brazil. Zootaxa, 1006, 23 - 32.
bibRefCitation.title: Two new species of Heterostylum Macquart (Diptera, Bombyliidae, Bombyliinae) from Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cunha & Lamas, 2005 : 25-28
(original description); 26 , figure 1 (whole animal in dorsal view), 2 (whole animal in lateral view); 27 , figure 3 (male terminalia in dorsal view), 4 (male terminalia in lateral view) and 5 (spermatheca).
Type locality: Limoeiro, Ceará , Brazil .

Holotype male with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26494 ”; ( 3 ) printed on red paper: “Holotipo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
| Cunha , A.M det. 2005 ”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26485 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26487 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: right leg II.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26489 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
| Cunha , A.M det. 2005 ”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: both tarsus of leg III.

Paratype male with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26490 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26491 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: right tarsus III.

Paratype male with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26492 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: head.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Limoeiro | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26493 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; left leg III glued at the first label; Missing parts: both flagellum and left tarsus of leg III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Ceará | Russas | Shannon e Alves | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26506 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: both flagellum.

Paratype male with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ São Paulo | Tamoio | Dez. [Dec.] 1944 | M. Barreto col.”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26513 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: left tarsus of leg III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Rio Grande do Norte | Ceará Mirim | Deusdedit Alves [col.] | VI – 940 [ 1940 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26541 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: both flagellum, right wing and both leg III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “Faz. [Fazenda] Malhada | Arcoverde, PE [ Pernambuco ]
vii. 1974
| C. R. N. Papavero”; ( 2 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

vii. 1974
| C. R. N. Papavero”; ( 2 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “

|

”.

|

”.

IV- 1945
”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26419 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
| Cunha , A.M det. 2005 ”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: last tarsomere of left leg III and right leg III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “Batatais - S. [São] Paulo | Março 1943 | A. Stafuzza leg.; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26435 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005
”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: left tarsus of leg III.

Paratype male with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “Batatais - S. [São] Paulo | Março 1943 | A. Stafuzza leg.; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26434 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
Heterostylum evenhuisi
|
Cunha & Lamas, 2005

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) handwritten on white paper: “Batatais - S. [São] Paulo | Março 1943 | A. Stafuzza leg.”; ( 2 ) printed on white paper: “ 26451 ”; ( 3 ) printed on green paper: “Paratypo”; ( 4 ) printed on white paper: “
